fields.name: location_information_header
fields.content: 1. Your property

fields.name: location_why
fields.content:
Reporting your property location will help Whitman County better allocate Voluntary Stewardship Program resources.

Your address will never be shared with anyone.

Use one of the methods below to set your location:

fields.name: geolocation
fields.placeholder: _(Are you on your property now? Click here to locate yourself automatically.)

fields.name: drag_map_info
fields.content: Drag and zoom the map manually.

fields.name: wetlands_header
fields.content: 2. Wetland areas

fields.name: wetlands_information
fields.content:
Description

Wetland areas are inundated or saturated by surface water or groundwater.

Appearance on map

fields.name: private-property_on_wetlands
fields.prompt: _(Is your property on any wetland areas?)

fields.name: frequently_flooded_header
fields.content: 3. Frequently flooded areas

fields.name: frequently_flooded_information
fields.content:
Description

Frequently flooded areas are subject to a 1% or greater chance of flooding every year.

Appearance on map

fields.name: private-property_on_frequently_flooded
fields.prompt: _(Is your property on any frequently flooded areas?)

fields.name: geologic_hazard_header
fields.content: 4. Geologic hazard areas

fields.name: geologic_hazard_information
fields.content:
Description

Geologic hazard areas are susceptible to erosion, sliding, earthquakes, and other geological events.

Appearance on map

fields.name: private-property_on_geologic_hazard
fields.prompt: _(Is your property on any geologic hazard areas?)

fields.name: critical_aquifer_header
fields.content: 5. Critical aquifer recharge areas

fields.name: critical_aquifer_information
fields.content:
Description

Critical aquifer recharge areas have a critical effect on aquifers used for potable water.

Appearance on map

fields.name: private-property_on_critical_aquifer
fields.prompt: _(Is your property on any critical aquifer recharge areas?)

fields.name: wildlife_conservation_header
fields.content: 6. Fish & wildlife conservation areas

fields.name: wildlife_conservation_information
fields.content:
Description

Fish & wildlife conservation areas are managed to maintain populations of fish and wildlife.

Appearance on map

fields.name: private-property_on_wildlife_conservation
fields.prompt: _(Is your property on any fish & wildlife conservation areas?)

fields.name: stewardship_practices_header
fields.content: 7. Your stewardship practices

fields.name: stewardship_practices_information
fields.content:
Your actions count! Please fill out the form below to officially report stewardship practices on your property.

If you are unsure about the meaning of a stewardship practice, click the symbol for more information.

fields.name: tillage_management_header
fields.content: A. Residue and Tillage Management

fields.name: precision_agriculture_datetime
fields.prompt: _(Approximately when did you last complete this action?)

fields.name: additional_info_header
fields.content: 8. Almost done!

fields.name: additional_info
fields.content:
Thank you for taking the time to report your stewardship practices.

Information on this page is optional, but will help Whitman County understand how landowners are implementing stewardship practices.

fields.name: my_image
fields.prompt: _(Show off your stewardship! Upload a few photos:)
fields.label: _(Upload photos)

fields.name: private-use_photos
fields.prompt: _(Can Whitman County VSP highlight your photos on our website?)

fields.name: private-share_story
fields.prompt: _(Would you be willing to share your stewardship story with the public?)
